brainly_data.question: Read this short text: You will need the wisdom of Solomon to sort out the solution to this disagreement. This reference to Solomon is which type of allusion and meaning? Biblical—Solomon made many difficult decisions Historical—Solomon was an important historical leader Mythological—Solomon resolved conflicts magically Pop culture—Solomon was a modern reformer
brainly_data.subject: English
